title: opening hours
firstParagraph: The restaurant is open Monday - Thursday from 11-20 and Friday - Saturday 12-22. We are closed Sundays
secondParagraph: For all bookings please fill out our booking form and we will get back to you with a confirmation !

title: about
firstParagraph: Our newly refurbished BBQ Steak House imports the very best quality meat from all over the world
secondParagraph: Our dedicated team of chefs pride themselves on sourcing happy meat which is both tasty and farm friendly. We dont compromoise on quality and not should you - Welcome to Holy BBQ !

title: menu
firstParagraph: Our menu is constantly being updated as our chefs continue to break the BBQ boundaries !
secondParagraph: Feel free to check out some of our current food items currently in circulation
